title: I Can't Buy Stuff
body: I wanted to buy Twitch (3150 IP), and it is possible considering i have slightly over 3300 IP, but it won't let me purchase him saying that I don't have enough IP. I tried re-logging, and even buying a 1 IP rune to try to fix it, but neither worked. Help me!

replies.body:
If you're using the Beta Client, try swapping back over to the Legacy Client from the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

If that doesn't work, reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can try some things from our end to resolve this.
